attributes.action: make horse owners take a compulsory test on horse care and management
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: it is surprising how many 'ignorant' horse owners there are in this country. horses are being subjected to incorrect feeding and exercise, lack of veterinary care, worming and misuse. these horses are suffering unnecessarily. a short course on horse husbandry would probably make all the difference.
